QuestData.Title: Along the Southern Front
QuestData.Description: I'm heading westward with Taoshi to gather the strongest I can find to confront the Sha of Hatred.$B$BI would like you to come with me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Ride with Taran Zhu and Taoshi to Dusklight Hollow.
QuestData.RewardText: Let's get this taken care of so we can get down to the bridge.
